C D G M N P V W Y

C

Classifier - Class in naivebayes
A two class naive Bayes classifier.
Classifier(double[][], double[][], double) - Constructor for class naivebayes.Classifier
This constructor method fits the parameters of two normal densities and stores the priors for each class
classify(double[], int) - Method in class naivebayes.Classifier
This method returns the probability of being in class 1 using only data from one feature which is in featureVector[featureNo]
classify(double[]) - Method in class naivebayes.Classifier
This method should be modified in order to return the probability of being in class 1 using all the components of the feature vector

D

Data - Class in naivebayes
This class reads in and stores data from a directory containing a number of Mel frequency cepstrum coefficient (MFCC) vector sequences.
Data(String) - Constructor for class naivebayes.Data
Constructor when the path to the MFCC files is provided
DataWithWav - Class in naivebayes
This class extends Data to also store sound wave amplitudes derived from the associated WAV files from another directory, and it has a method to return them.
DataWithWav(String, String) - Constructor for class naivebayes.DataWithWav
Constructor when the MFCC files and associated Wav files are provided
density(double) - Method in class naivebayes.Normal
Method to evaluate the density function p(x) at a specified point x

G

getMeanMfcc() - Method in class naivebayes.Data
Method to get the time-averaged MFCC vectors for all the examples - size[noMfcc][noExamples]
getMeanMfcc(int) - Method in class naivebayes.Data
Method to get the time-averaged MFCC vector for one example - size[noMfcc]
getMfcc(int) - Method in class naivebayes.Data
Method to get the MFCC vectors for one example - size[noMfcc][sequence length]
getNumberExamples() - Method in class naivebayes.Data
Method to get the number of examples in the data set
getSoundWave(int) - Method in class naivebayes.DataWithWav
Method to return an array of doubles containing one sound wave scaled to lie between -1 and 1.

main(String[]) - Static method in class naivebayes.PlotFittedNormal

mean - Variable in class naivebayes.Normal
 
mfccRate - Static variable in class naivebayes.Data
Sampling rate for MFCC vectors in samples per second

N

naivebayes - package naivebayes
 
noMfcc - Static variable in class naivebayes.Data
Number of MFCCs used
Normal - Class in naivebayes
Class representing a univariate Normal distribution
Normal(double, double) - Constructor for class naivebayes.Normal
Constructor method to create a normal object given the mean and variance
Normal(double[]) - Constructor for class naivebayes.Normal
Constructor method to create a normal object by fitting the mean and variance to the empirical mean and variance of some data held in an array

P

PlotFittedNormal - Class in naivebayes
Plotting normal densities fitted to the time-averaged 1st MFCC component for each class of data
PlotFittedNormal() - Constructor for class naivebayes.PlotFittedNormal
 
PlotHistogram - Class in naivebayes
Plotting histogram of time-averaged 1st MFCC component for each class of data
PlotHistogram() - Constructor for class naivebayes.PlotHistogram
 
PlotSound - Class in naivebayes
Class demonstrating how to read in some MFCC and wav file data, and plot an example.
PlotSound() - Constructor for class naivebayes.PlotSound

variance - Variable in class naivebayes.Normal
 

W

wavRate - Static variable in class naivebayes.DataWithWav
Frame rate in WAV file in samples per second

Y

YesNoClassifier - Class in naivebayes
Using a naive Bayes classifier to distinguish utterances of the word yes from the word no
YesNoClassifier() - Constructor for class naivebayes.YesNoClassifier
